headline: Teledyne announces Xtium3 PCIe Gen4 frame grabber series for ultra-fast image acquisition
summary: Teledyne DALSA's Xtium3 Teledyne’s Xtium3 PCIe Gen4 frame grabber series MONTREAL, Dec. 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Teledyne DALSA, a Teledyne Technologies [NYSE: TDY] company, announces the release of the Xtium™3 PCIe Gen4 family, a next-generation frame grabber engineered to deliver maximum sustained throughput and ready-to-use image data for high-performance industrial applications. Building on the proven Xtium2 platform, the first model, Xtium3-CLHS PX8 supports the Camera Link HS® (CLHS) s
